text: Gain a card costing up to $4. Choose one: Put it into your hand; or +1 Card and +1 Action.

name: Warlord
text:
+1 Action
At the start of your next turn, +2 Cards. Until then, other players can't play an Action from their hand that they have 2 or more copies of in play.

name: Sibyl
text:
+4 Cards
+1 Action
Put a card from your hand on top of your deck, and another on the bottom.

name: Distant Shore
text:
+2 Cards
+1 Action
Gain an Estate.
2VP

name: Lich
text:
+6 Cards
+2 Actions
Skip a turn.
When you trash this, discard it and gain a cheaper card from the trash.

name: Stronghold
text:
Choose one: +$3; or at the start of your next turn, +3 Cards.
2VP

name: Territory
text:
Worth 1VP per differently named Victory card you have.
When you gain this, gain a Gold per empty Supply pile.

name: Architects' Guild
text: When you gain a card, you may spend 2 Favors to gain a cheaper non-Victory card.

name: Band of Nomads
text: When you gain a card costing $3 or more, you may spend a Favor, for +1 Card, or +1 Action, or +1 Buy.

name: Cave Dwellers
text: At the start of your turn, you may spend a Favor, to discard a card then draw a card. Repeat as desired.

name: Circle of Witches
text: After playing a Liaison, you may spend 3 Favors to have each other player gain a Curse.

name: City-state
text: When you gain an Action card during your turn, you may spend 2 Favors to play it.

name: Coastal Haven
text: When discarding your hand in Clean-up, you may spend any number of Favors to keep that many cards in hand for next turn (you still draw 5).

name: Crafters' Guild
text: At the start of your turn, you may spend 2 Favors to gain a card costing up to $4 onto your deck.

name: Desert Guides
text: At the start of your turn, you may spend a Favor to discard your hand and draw 5 cards. Repeat as desired.

name: Family of Inventors
text:
At the start of your Buy phase, you may put a Favor token you have on a non-Victory Supply pile.
Cards cost $1 less per Favor token on their piles.

name: Fellowship of Scribes
text: After playing an Action, if you have 4 or fewer cards in hand, you may spend a Favor for +1 Card.

name: Forest Dwellers
text: At the start of your turn, you may spend a Favor to look at the top 3 cards of your deck, discard any number and put the rest back in any order.

name: Gang of Pickpockets
text: At the start of your turn, discard down to 4 cards in hand unless you spend a Favor.

name: Island Folk
text: At the end of your turn, if the previous turn wasn't yours, you may spend 5 Favors to take another turn.

name: League of Bankers
text: At the start of your Buy phase, +$1 per 4 Favors you have (round down).

name: League of Shopkeepers
text:
After playing a Liaison, if you have 5 or more Favors, +$1,
and if 10 or more, +1 Action and +1 Buy.

name: Market Towns
text: At the start of your Buy phase, you may spend a Favor to play an Action card from your hand. Repeat as desired.

name: Mountain Folk
text: At the start of your turn, you may spend 5 Favors for +3 Cards.

name: Order of Astrologers
text: When shuffling, you may pick one card per Favor you spend to go on top.

name: Order of Masons
text: When shuffling, you may pick up to 2 cards per Favor you spend to put into your discard pile.

name: Peaceful Cult
text: At the start of your Buy phase, you may spend any number of Favors to trash that many cards from your hand.

name: Plateau Shepherds
text: When scoring, pair up your Favors with cards you have costing $2, for 2VP per pair.

name: Trappers' Lodge
text: When you gain a card, you may spend a Favor to put it onto your deck.

name: Woodworkers' Guild
text: At the start of your Buy phase, you may spend a Favor to trash an Action card from your hand. If you did, gain an Action card.

name: Black Market
text:
+$2
Reveal the top 3 cards of the Black Market deck. Play any number of Treasures from your hand. You may buy one of the revealed cards. Put the rest on the bottom of the Black Market deck in any order.
Setup: Make a Black Market deck out of different unused Kingdom cards.

name: Church
text:
+1 Action
Set aside up to 3 cards from your hand face down. At the start of your next turn, put them into your hand, then you may trash a card from your hand.

name: Dismantle
text: Trash a card from your hand. If it costs $1 or more, gain a cheaper card and a Gold.

name: Envoy
text: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses one. Discard that one and put the rest into your hand.

name: Sauna
text:
+1 Card
+1 Action
You may play an Avanto from your hand.
While this is in play, when you play a Silver, you may trash a card from your hand.

name: Walled Village
text:
+1 Card
+2 Actions
At the start of Clean-up, if you have this and no more than one other Action card in play, you may put this onto your deck.

name: Avanto
text:
+3 Cards
You may play a Sauna from your hand.

name: Governor
text:
+1 Action
Choose one; you get the version in parentheses: Each player gets +1 (+3) Cards; or each player gains a Silver (Gold); or each player may trash a card from their hand and gain a card costing exactly $1 ($2) more.

name: Stash
text:
$2
When shuffling, you may look through your remaining deck, and may put this anywhere in the shuffled cards.

name: Summon
text: Gain an Action card costing up to $4. Set it aside. If you did, then at the start of your next turn, play it.

name: Captain
text:
Now and at the start of your next turn:
Play a non-Duration non-Command Action card from the Supply costing up to $4, leaving it there.

name: Prince
text: You may set aside (on this) a non-Duration Action card from your hand costing up to $4. At the start of each of your turns, play that card, leaving it set aside.
